name: Draw Escape
description:
What is this place? Full of gears and dangers! The crew need to escape from it, but they can't pass without your help!

The crew will keep moving disregarding the obstacles, and you need to draw some lines with your magic finger so that you can protect them from accidental death. Think fast, or someone may lose his life, try your best to find a path and save them all. The more people you saved and the less ink you used to draw, the more rewards and stars you can earn!

Here we go, help the crew escape safely and begin drawing!

Features:
* Suitable for all ages
* Challenging puzzles, think fast to draw
* Free to play, play it anytime anywhere
* Try your best to save all the crew with the least ink for all 3 stars
